sources.title: Georgie and the Dragon (1951)
sources.description: Georgie, a young Scottish lad, befriends a baby dragon and takes it home as a pet and companion. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/georgie-and-the-dragon-1951/

metadata.Plot: Georgie, a young Scottish lad, befriends a baby dragon and takes it home as a pet and companion. Complications arise, however, when the dragon begins growing rapidly.
metadata.Writer: Phil Eastman, John Hubley, Bill Scott
metadata.Actors: Marvin Miller, Marian Richman, Bill Scott
